column1: Grim settled in a dale that would later carry his name, [[Grimslade]]. It would be inhabited by him and his descendants until the days of [[Grimbold]] in the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Nancy Smith]], "[[Index questions]]". Quoted in [[Wayne G. Hammond]], [[Christina Scull]] (2008), ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', p. 571.</ref>
